Shaped Shadewood Compound Bow!
Ok this is great, just found out there is a new bow out there and I wanted to show all my friends out there, I got a pic of the items in the Fletching kit showing you step by step. and the part were you hope it dont go poof on you hehe, but to my joy and woots I did it hehe, and then I got to see the stats on the bow... wow nice bow you just make there Phlesh ... I grin sitting at my key board. hehe well if any one in EF would like this bow I would love to make you one, but just now this is the best bow you can make in the game and its new to the game. now I do not charge for my services just that you pay for the cost of the bow. also it's not cheep to make , if I got enchanter buffs I can buy the Shadewoos for 350pp and the cams sell for 40pp pice, now you need 2 cams for this. and a plan like11pp, with out enchanter buffs it would be more and I wont make one with out the buffs even though Verant said you dont need them. but I can tell you I been making bows for a long time and when i dont have buffs on fail 40% of the time when making high end bows. when i got them on I do well. so you got 60% I can make one. but it is a hard bow to make and costly. Just so you know I make 2 out of 3 tonight, and thats not too bad in my book =) if any of you like me to make you a bow like this one give me a tell in the game. Phlesh lvl 54 druid on Povar Fletching skill 203
